TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 部分包含两个代码示例。The section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何从派生类类。The first code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class. 第二个代码示例演示如何显示`StyledTable`在设计时类。The second code example demonstrates how to display the `StyledTable` class at design time. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的设计器类`StyledTableDesigner`，它派生自类，并用于在由派生的类的设计时显示两个单元格类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a designer class named `StyledTableDesigner`, which is derived from the class, and is used to display two cells at design time for a class that is derived from the class. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtabledesigner.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用`DesignerAttribute`相关联`StyledTableDesigner`类的`StyledTable`类，以便它可以在设计时显示。The following code example uses the `DesignerAttribute` to associate the `StyledTableDesigner` class with the `StyledTable` class so that it can be displayed at design time. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtable.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML。

span.span: The HTML used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可确保表具有至少一个行和单元格和单元格包含在设计时显示一些文本。The method ensures that the table has at least one row and cell and that the cells contain some text for display at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以显示行和单元格的`StyledTable`设计图面上的类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to display rows and cells for the `StyledTable` class on the design surface. 在`Try`阻止，代码将检查是否在表中包含任何行或单元格，以及如果不是，请创建一个行并执行一个循环来创建两个单元格的行，以及要在设计时显示每个单元中的占位符文本。In the `Try` block, the code checks whether the table contains any rows or cells, and if it does not, creates a row and performs a loop to create two cells for the row, along with placeholder text to display in each cell at design time. 如果表不为空，但一个行，代码将执行相同的循环来创建和填充单元格。If the table is not empty, but a row is, the code performs the same loop to create and populate the cells. 在`Finally`块中，代码返回到其原始状态的值。In the `Finally` block, the code returns the values to their original state. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtabledesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetPersistInnerHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPersistInnerHtml () As String
